mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY PURCHASECNT DESC) ROWNNUM FROM SEMANYPURCHASEITEMVIEW s) WHERE ROWNNUM <= 8 ORDER BY ROWNNUM ASC
SELECT * FROM (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY PURCHASECNT DESC) ROWNNUM FROM SEMANYPURCHASEITEMVIEW s) WHERE ROWNNUM <= #{no} ORDER BY ROWNNUM ASC
SELECT * FROM (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DEADLINE ASC) ROWNNUM FROM SEDEADLINEPURCHASEDDAYVIEW s) WHERE ROWNNUM <= #{no} ORDER BY ROWNNUM ASC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY distance ASC) ROWNNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM ( SELECT *, 6371000 * ACOS( COS(RADIANS(latitude)) * COS(RADIANS(#{latitude})) * COS(RADIANS(longitude) - RADIANS(#{longitude})) + SIN(RADIANS(latitude)) * SIN(RADIANS(#{latitude})) ) AS distance FROM SEAROUNDPURCHASEVIEW) WHERE distance <= 10000)) WHERE ROWNNUM <= 5 ORDER BY ROWNNUM ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM SESELECTITEMLISTVIEW s WHERE name LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM SESELECTITEMLISTVIEW s WHERE scode = #{scode}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY PURCHASECNT DESC) ROWN FROM SESELECTITEMLISTVIEW s WHERE scode = #{scode}) WHERE ROWN <= 6 ORDER BY purchasecnt DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) purchasechk FROM (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY PURCHASENO ORDER BY REGDATE DESC) rown FROM PURCHASESTATUS p WHERE itemno = #{itemno}) WHERE rown = 1 AND state = 0
SELECT count(*) cnt FROM PURCHASESTATUS p WHERE PURCHASENO = #{purchaseno}
